content:
this is a single endpoint from an open api spec document
it has been minified by removing unnecessary kvps
additionally common terms have been abbreviated  operationId: DeleteBucket path: https://gateway.stackpath.com/storage/v1/stacks/{stack_id}/buckets/{bucket_id} content: params
name stackid
desc a stack id or slug
in path
required true
schema
type str
name bucketid
desc a storage bucket id
in path
required true
schema
type str
name forcedelete
desc force bucket deletion even if there are contents inside it
in query
required false
schema
type bool
format bool
sum delete a bucket
responses
title: 5_Buckets_DeleteBucket_24.json
